concept.title: Duplicate Product Validations

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Validate that active products are not duplicated for the same bill-to account within the agreement date period, respecting excluded products.

conbody.p: For each agreement, validate features checks that across programs, you do not have duplicate products and participants for the same Bill-to Account within the same agreement date period. Validations are performed at the SKU level.
For different kinds of programs, validation for different products is done as follows:

ul.li: Package Saving Program - For package saving programs, you can have overlapping products between primary and secondary packages of the same section. The same product can be a part of the primary as well as a secondary package within the program. A validation error is only thrown if the product is duplicated in the same package.

Bundle Saving Program - In bundle saving programs, duplicate child products are allowed but you cannot have duplicate top line products. Between bundle saving program and other programs, you cannot have any duplicate products.
Reward Saving Program - In reward saving program, only benefit products are validated.
Partnership Saving Program - In partnership saving program, you cannot have duplicate products in parent line and child lines of the program.
Month End Billing Program - In Month End Billing program, you cannot have duplicate products across programs.

note.p: Duplicate product validation feature does not consider excluded products.
